overview: Gravure Film Director HCK (Ayaka is Your Angel, Les Gamins) brings pop culture character Catherine to life in this re-imagining of themes found in the popular PlayStation and XBox 360 video game.  Life, Love, Death, and Rebirth flow through super sexy Asian starlet CoCo in her scandalous video debut!  Experience the erotic art film that has the internet buzzing... a film that could only come from the twisted minds in Japan!
tagline: From the Director of Ayaka Is Your Angel and Les Gamins
title: Another Take On Catherine
